items.content_html: LinkShrink is a lightweight URL shortening service built in TypeScript. Designed for efficiency and ease of use, LinkShrink takes long URLs and generates shorter, manageable links.

items.content_html: dynamic-form-bs is a lightweight and flexible library for building and managing dynamic, metadata-driven forms in React applications. It simplifies the creation of complex forms by allowing developers to define forms declaratively through JSON or model-based dynamic fields
items.title: Serge24/dynamic-form-react-bs5: dynamic-form-bs is a lightweight and flexible library for building and managing dynamic, metadata-driven forms in React applications. It simplifies the creation of complex forms by allowing developers to define forms declaratively through JSON or model-based dynamic fields

items.content_html: Chat-Super is a lightweight, hassle-free chat application that lets you connect with others instantly without the need for sign-ups or accounts. Built with Next.js, Socket.io, and Tailwind CSS, this app is perfect for private conversations and collaborative chats.
items.title: mankarshubham81/super-chat: Chat-Super is a lightweight, hassle-free chat application that lets you connect with others instantly without the need for sign-ups or accounts. Built with Next.js, Socket.io, and Tailwind CSS, this app is perfect for private conversations and collaborative chats.

items.content_html: Diesel is a simple and lightweight HTTP server library for Bunjs, designed to give you control over your API routes and middleware in an intuitive and efficient way. With DieselJS, you can quickly set up a server, define routes, and optimize important routes for faster response times.
items.title: diesel-core/diesel: Diesel is a simple and lightweight HTTP server library for Bunjs, designed to give you control over your API routes and middleware in an intuitive and efficient way. With DieselJS, you can quickly set up a server, define routes, and optimize important routes for faster response times.
